Please make one payment for all items, will all shipping information and item numbers included. Insurance ~ You are responsible for any costs of insuring your items. If you choose not to insure you item and it is lost or damaged by the post office we will not issue a refund. This rarely happens, but is always a possibility as the USPS is not infallible. Insurance rates are as follows: For $50.00 insurance add $1.10; For $100.00 insurance add $2.00; For each $100.00 additional insurance add additional $1.00. Item.Description: .titledata { font-family: verdana, sans-serif; font-size:18px; color:#FC1230; } .description { font-family: verdana, sans-serif; color:#000000; } .link { font-family: verdana, sans-serif; font-size:12px; underline; } HR { color: #000000; } 3 Size 12 Months Infant Clothing Items Click image to view larger version Click image to view larger version There are three items in this lot of infants clothing, size 12 months. First is a darling little pink hooded sweatshirt with Minnie Mouse in a heart on the front, and mouse ears on the black hood; brand name "Disney Babies," made by Walt Disney Co. It is made of 100% acrylic, and the tag shows it is for infants 16 1/2 to 20 pounds. The paint on Minnie's face is beginning to show a little bit of wear, but the construction of the sweatshirt is in excellent condition. Next we have a long-sleeve sweatshirt that is light yellow in color with assorted flowers all over it; brand name "Garanimals". It has a yellow scalloped band on the neckline and solid yellow edging on the sleeves and the bottom. It is made of 60% cotton and 40% polyester. The front of the shirt does have some spots on it, and I am not sure if they will come out in the wash or not. The last item is a pair of 100% cotton bib overalls by McKids (with the golden arches) from the McDonald's Corp. They are a light green corduroy with red and purple flowers all over them. The area on the sides at the waist have elastic for a comfortable fit and they have a snap crotch for easy diaper changing. They have been worn, but they are in extremely good condition. Each "parking ticket" carries a "$100 FINE." Just imagine the fun you're going to have with these. Imagine how YOU would react to see one on your car. The blaze orange color make them easily noticeable from a long distance away. These tickets are professionally printed on quality stock and look like the real thing. Unfortunately the poor photos do not show the actual quality of these tickets. They are very convincing until the recipient starts to read the fine print. These tickets sell for as much as $2.00 or $3.00 each in specialty shops. The fine print says: "This notice may be returned by mail, carrier pigeon, personally, or by an authorized employee of the Tooth Fairy. A hearing at the North Pole may be obtained upon written request of the registered owner. Failure to obey this notice within ten seconds after the date of this violation may result in the non-renewal of the license to drive & the registration by of the registered owner. This notice may be appealed (yea, right) and adjusted by mail if supporting statement(s) & any unnecessary documentation is mailed within ten seconds after the date of violation. If registered owner is not laughing uncontrollably with ten seconds of receiving this ticket, the fine is increased to $200.00 - Failure of the lessee of taxis or leased vehicles to obey parking violation notices issued by the Tooth Fairy during their lease may result in a warped sense of humor & the desire to play pranks on their family and friends. - FAILURE TO PAY PARKING FINES MAY SUBJECT MOTOR VEHICLE OWNER TO FITS OF LAUGHTER. " Terms: Only $1.00 extra for first class mail shipping and handling, no matter how many tickets you want. (Canadian shipping only $1.25 extra.) Item.Name: ARAN CRAFTS IRISH KNIT SWEATER COAT LARGE
Item.Description: NEW & NEVER OPENED or WORN. This is Individually packaged and sells for $150.00 and more. DIRECT from IRISH Imports and the "West End Knitwear Ltd Company" in Monasterevan, County Kildare, Ireland !! These are ONLY available in a LARGE size ! Made of the FINEST MERINO WOOL on Earth. THIS IS AN OUTERWEAR SWEATER/COAT. This wool is Prized for its supple & Gentle handle; Its SILKY LONG fibers giving WARMTH with LIGHTNESS. It is unrivaled in its ability to WICK, ABSORB & EVAPORATE moisture, a natural insulator that keeps you warm in the winter, yet COOL in the summer. It is said that the merino wool forst came to IRELAND in the holds of the Spanish & French frigates smuggling brandy, wines and other contraband to the isolated west coast. Item.Description: .titledata { font-family: verdana, sans-serif; font-size:18px; color:#FFFFFF; } .description { font-family: verdana, sans-serif; color:#000000; } .link { font-family: verdana, sans-serif; font-size:13px; underline; } HR { color: #000000; } NEW! LILAC *FAIRYTALE* FLOWER GIRL DRESS 8 Click image to view larger version Click image to view larger version Click image to view larger version Click image to view larger version Inspired by dresses worn in Medieval times, this dress looks like something a young Renaissance Princess would have worn! It sells for 140.00 in the catalog "Storybook Heirlooms" It would be lovely for a Pageant, Party, Formal or Flower Girl Dress. Please Click on the pictures so you can see this breathtaking beauty up close. The bodice is beautiful Lavendar Satin, the sleeves have a lovely off the shoulder look and delicate straps. The waistline is accented with beautiful roses made of satin and organza. The Skirting of this dress has 4 layers...One layer of Lavendar satin, followed by 3 layers of sheer fine lavendar tulle. The outside layer has beautiful Lavendar Roses adorning it and gives this dress a beautiful Fairy Like Look! ...This dress has a beautiful fullness all it's own...but could be worn with a crinoline for extra fullness. I have this dress up for auction in sizes 2, 4, 6, 8, 10 and 12, in Ivory, White, Pink, Blue and Lavendar, in case you have more than one Princess and would like matching dresses !!! The matching Hair Wreath is also up for auction for 13.50. Shipping on this dress is 7.00, insured. I WILL SHIP ANY ADDITIONAL DRESSES WON ON AUCTION FREE!!! Measurements: length is 35" bodice to skirt is 10 1/2" skirt to hem is 24 1/2" sleeves are 9 1/2" chest is 28 1/2" waist is 28" Thank You so Much for bidding on our auctions! All items now shipping within 48 hours!!! We guarantee you will have it by Christmas if you use our UPS EXPRESS 2 Day Shipping! Shipping is a falt 12.00 for the first item, 3.00 per additional item. tracking information is available so you don't have to worry! I also ship Priority Mail, but it is currently taking longer than 3 days. Please read our "About Me" page for all auction information before you bid...It is very important!!! An auction is a contract, so please be sure to take note of my terms. During the Holiday Season we are doing things differently to ensure that you get your merchandise VERY FAST. We are trying to ship within 2 days or less! We also offer express shipping and are participating in Ebay's Express Shipping program FIGNIB 65195 I spend the most of my time answering emails..I can answer 20 and receive 20 more in it's place during the time it takes me to answer them. I have been spending over 8 hours per day answering emails and I still can't get to all of them. Since only one person can answer emails at a time, I am rerouting certain ones to my husband. (Shipping questions, problems with order) His Email is on our "about me" page. Also, we need you to learn how to get the most from our customer service and a few policies have changed regarding exchanges etc. If You Can't Find the Size or Color or item you are looking for, please E mail me at HeavenSent4Kids@aol.com and I will send you a Link to the proper auction. Please Visit our Storefronts to shop by pictures. Both Storefronts Have a Search Engine so you can find what you are looking for the easy way!
